subject: Olympic Games (2018)
Colleges and Universities
Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: A little-noticed 2012 study found that clubs that sent many players to the Olympics suffered a bigger performance drop-off, on the whole, than clubs that sent few players.
snippet: A little-noticed 2012 study found that clubs that sent many players to the Olympics suffered a bigger performance drop-off, on the whole, than clubs that sent few players.
